data.title: B Site Meddle Boxes + Ruse Execute
data.description: When executing the B Site, use these standard smokes to shut off angles. Follow up with your Meddle if there is a Defender playing on site.

data.title: A Site Top Meddle + Ruse Execute
data.description: When executing the A Site, use these standard smokes and a Meddle to pressure Defenders playing on site. You might be able to spam and pick a Defender off.
